name: market for used long liner, steel | used long liner, steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20358/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'used long liner, steel', in the Global geography.;This market connects the supply chain of used long liners, steel from the point of their generation till the place they receive their final treatment. No transportation is considered in this market as the treatment is assumed to be on the shore. Used long liner, steel is any long liner reaching its end of life timeframe.

Activity starts after the production of used long liner, steel.

Activity ends with the provision of used long liner, steel to its relevant consumers (treatment activities).
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
